commands:
configure terminal
 no ip domain-lookup
 line console 0
 logging synchronous
 exec-timeout 0 0
 exit
 line vty 0 4
 logging synchronous
 exec-timeout 0 0
 end
 copy running-config startup-config

configure terminal
 hostname DEVICE_HOSTNAME
 exit
 copy running-config startup-config

configure terminal
 vlan VLAN_NUMBER
 exit
 interface vlan VLAN_NUMBER
 no shutdown
 end
 copy running-config startup-config

configure terminal
 ip domain-name DOMAIN_NAME
 crypto key generate rsa
 2048
 ip ssh version 2
 line vty 0 4
 transport input ssh
 exit
 exit

configure terminal
 ip domain-name DOMAIN_NAME
 crypto key generate rsa
 2048
 ip ssh version 2
 line vty 0 4
 transport input telnet
 exit
 exit

configure terminal
 ip domain-name DOMAIN_NAME
 crypto key generate rsa
 2048
 ip ssh version 2
 line vty 0 4
 transport input ssh telnet
 exit
 exit

commads:
write erase
 
 delete flash:vlan.dat
 
 y
 reload
 n
